text:
Duties (Recognised Stock Exchange) Order 2012

I make the following order under section 254 of the Duties Act 2001 .

6 July 2012

LARA GIDDINGS

Treasurer

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Duties (Recognised Stock Exchange) Order 2012 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Recognised stock exchange
    The New Zealand Stock Exchange (NZX) is declared to be a recognised stock exchange for the purpose of the Duties Act 2001 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 18 July 2012

This order is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
